creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue, white, red; three dimensional animal face in open band-like design; black eyes; white horns; nose with multicolored fringe; red ears; face on blue background; blue band with blue and white trimming; some yellow metallic paper trim on eyes and horns
title: Child's Hat/Headband
